The Tourist Information Centre is here to serve residents as well as visitors to the area. We can offer friendly expert advice on a wide range of topics.

What's On

Up-to-date information about what's on at local theatres, cinemas, concert halls, and other places of entertainment, plus what special events are coming soon.

Where to eat and drink.

Information about local restaurants. Where to find that special place for an important occasion. Details of small cafes and tea rooms and where to go for a quiet drink or lively night out.

Local walks and tours

Information on local walks and organized events by the Country Park Wardens, local coach tours and sightseeing excursions.
